JianZhiOfferPython/26.html.title: 26. 二叉搜索树与双向链表
JianZhiOfferPython/26.html.body:
26.二叉搜索树与双向链表
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class TreeNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.left = None
#         self.right = None

class Solution:
    def Convert(self, pRootOfTree):
        # write code here
        if pRootOfTree == None:
            return pRootOfTree
        if pRootOfTree.left == None and pRootOfTree.right == None:
            return pRootOfTree

        self.Convert(pRootOfTree.left)
        left = pRootOfTree.left

        if left:
            while left.right:
                left = left.right
            pRootOfTree.left = left
            left.right = pRootOfTree

        self.Convert(pRootOfTree.right)
        right = pRootOfTree.right

        if right:
            while right.left:
                right = right.left
            pRootOfTree.right = right
            right.left = pRootOfTree

        while pRootOfTree.left:
            pRootOfTree = pRootOfTree.left
        return pRootOfTree

JianZhiOfferPython/31.html.title: 31. 整数中1出现的次数
JianZhiOfferPython/31.html.body:
31.整数中1出现的次数
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
class Solution:
    def NumberOf1Between1AndN_Solution(self, n):
        # write code here
        '''
        设N = abcde ,其中abcde分别为十进制中各位上的数字。
        如果要计算百位上1出现的次数，它要受到3方面的影响：百位上的数字，百位以下（低位）的数字，百位以上（高位）的数字。
        ① 如果百位上数字为0，百位上可能出现1的次数由更高位决定。比如：12013，则可以知道百位出现1的情况可能是：100~199，1100~1199,2100~2199，，...，11100~11199，一共1200个。可以看出是由更高位数字（12）决定，并且等于更高位数字（12）乘以 当前位数（100）。
        ② 如果百位上数字为1，百位上可能出现1的次数不仅受更高位影响还受低位影响。比如：12113，则可以知道百位受高位影响出现的情况是：100~199，1100~1199,2100~2199，，....，11100~11199，一共1200个。和上面情况一样，并且等于更高位数字（12）乘以 当前位数（100）。但同时它还受低位影响，百位出现1的情况是：12100~12113,一共114个，等于低位数字（113）+1。
        ③ 如果百位上数字大于1（2~9），则百位上出现1的情况仅由更高位决定，比如12213，则百位出现1的情况是：100~199,1100~1199，2100~2199，...，11100~11199,12100~12199,一共有1300个，并且等于更高位数字+1（12+1）乘以当前位数（100）。
        '''
        n_copy = n
        n_len = 0
        while n_copy > 0:
            n_copy //= 10
            n_len += 1

        res = 0
        for i in range(n_len):
            upper = n // (10 ** (i + 1))
            mid = (n % (10 ** (i + 1))) // (10 ** i)
            lower = n % (10 ** i)

            if mid == 0:
                res += upper * (10 ** i)
            elif mid == 1:
                res += (upper * (10 ** i) + (lower + 1))
            else:
                res += (upper + 1) * (10 ** i)
        return res

JianZhiOfferPython/35.html.title: 35. 数组中的逆序对
JianZhiOfferPython/35.html.body:
35. 数组中的逆序对
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
class Solution:
    def InversePairs(self, data):
        # write code here
        '''参考书上的解法'''
        if len(data) == 0:
            return 0
        # copy
        copy = [0 for _ in range(len(data))]
        for index, val in enumerate(data):
            copy[index] = val

        count = self.InversePairsCore(data, copy, 0, len(data) - 1)
        return count

    def InversePairsCore(self, data, copy, start, end):
        if start == end:
            return 0

        mid_index = (start + end) // 2
        left_count = self.InversePairsCore(data, copy, start, mid_index)
        right_count = self.InversePairsCore(data, copy, mid_index + 1, end)

        count = 0
        i = mid_index
        j = end
        cur_copy = end
        while i >= start and j > mid_index:
            if data[i] > data[j]:
                count += j - mid_index
                copy[cur_copy] = data[i]
                cur_copy -= 1
                i -= 1
                if count > 1000000007:
                    count = count % 1000000007
            else:
                copy[cur_copy] = data[j]
                cur_copy -= 1
                j -= 1
        while i > start:
            copy[cur_copy] = data[i]
            cur_copy -= 1
            i -= 1
        while j > mid_index:
            copy[cur_copy] = data[j]
            cur_copy -= 1
            j -= 1
        for t in range(start, end + 1):
            data[t] = copy[t]
        return (left_count + right_count + count) % 1000000007

JianZhiOfferPython/36.html.title: 36. 两个链表的第一个公共节点
JianZhiOfferPython/36.html.body:
36. 两个链表的第一个公共节点
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class ListNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.next = None
class Solution:
    def FindFirstCommonNode(self, pHead1, pHead2):
        # write code here
        '''双指针法，统计长度，然后寻找共同地址'''
        len_1, len_2 = 0, 0

        temp = pHead1
        while temp:
            len_1 += 1
            temp = temp.next

        temp = pHead2
        while temp:
            len_2 += 1
            temp = temp.next

        if len_1 > len_2:
            for _ in range(len_1 - len_2):
                pHead1 = pHead1.next
        elif len_1

JianZhiOfferPython/39.html.body:
39. 平衡二叉树
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class TreeNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.left = None
#         self.right = None
class Solution:
    def __init__(self):
        self.level = 0

    def IsBalanced_Solution(self, pRoot):
        # write code here
        self.IsBalanced_Solution_Helper(pRoot)
        if abs(self.level) > 1:
            return False
        else:
            return True

    def IsBalanced_Solution_Helper(self, pRoot):
        if not pRoot:
            return 0
        left_level = self.IsBalanced_Solution_Helper(pRoot.left)
        right_level = self.IsBalanced_Solution_Helper(pRoot.right)
        cur_level = left_level - right_level
        print(pRoot.val, cur_level)
        if abs(cur_level) > abs(self.level):
            self.level = cur_level
        return max(left_level, right_level) + 1

46. 孩子们的游戏（圆圈中最后剩下的数）
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
class Solution:
    def LastRemaining_Solution(self, n, m):
        # write code here
        # 传统方法：实现O(mn)，空间O(n)
        '''children = list(range(n))
        if not children:
            return -1

        index = 0
        while len(children) > 1:
            index = (index + m - 1) % len(children)
            print(children[index])
            children.pop(index)
        return children[0]'''

        # 数学归纳法
        if n == 0:
            return -1
        last = 0
        for i in range(2, n+1):
            last = (last + m) % i
        return last

JianZhiOfferPython/56.html.body:
56. 删除链表中重复的结点
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class ListNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.next = None
class Solution:
    def deleteDuplication(self, pHead):
        # write code here
        if not pHead:
            return None
        if pHead.next == None:
            return pHead

        # 添加一个头节点 处理头部连续问题
        pNew = ListNode(0)
        pNew.next = pHead

        pre, cur = pNew, pHead
        while cur:
            flag = False # 是否删除cur
            while cur.next and cur.val == cur.next.val:
                cur.next = cur.next.next
                flag = True
            if flag:
                pre.next = cur.next
                cur = cur.next
            else:
                cur = cur.next
                pre = pre.next
        return pNew.next

JianZhiOfferPython/57.html.title: 57. 二叉树的下一个结点
JianZhiOfferPython/57.html.body:
57. 二叉树的下一个结点
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class TreeLinkNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.left = None
#         self.right = None
#         self.next = None
class Solution:
    def GetNext(self, pNode):
        # write code here
        # 有右子树：找右子树最左节点，无右子树：找父节点
        # 有右子树
        if pNode.right:
            temp = pNode.right
            while temp.left:
                temp = temp.left
            return temp
        # 没有右子树
        temp = pNode
        while temp.next:
            if temp.next.right == temp:# 自己是父节点右子树
                temp = temp.next
                continue
            else:
                return temp.next
        return temp.next

JianZhiOfferPython/59.html.title: 59. 按之字形顺序打印二叉树
JianZhiOfferPython/59.html.body:
59. 按之字形顺序打印二叉树
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class TreeNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.left = None
#         self.right = None
class Solution:
    def Print(self, pRoot):
        # write code here
        # 参考书上思路
        if not pRoot:
            return []

        ret = []
        tempRet = []
        s = [[], []]
        curIndex, nextIndex = 0, 1 # 判断插入顺序，是从左到右还是从右到左
        s[curIndex].append(pRoot)
        while len(s[0]) != 0 or len(s[1]) != 0:
            tempNode = s[curIndex].pop()
            tempRet.append(tempNode.val)

            if curIndex == 0:
                # 下一行从右到左打印，需左到右压入
                if tempNode.left:
                    s[nextIndex].append(tempNode.left)
                if tempNode.right:
                    s[nextIndex].append(tempNode.right)
            else:
                # 下一行从左到右打印，需右到左压入
                if tempNode.right:
                    s[nextIndex].append(tempNode.right)
                if tempNode.left:
                    s[nextIndex].append(tempNode.left)

            if len(s[curIndex]) == 0:
                ret.append(tempRet)
                tempRet = []
                curIndex, nextIndex = nextIndex, curIndex
        return ret

JianZhiOfferPython/60.html.title: 60. 把二叉树打印成多行
JianZhiOfferPython/60.html.body:
60. 把二叉树打印成多行
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class TreeNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.left = None
#         self.right = None
class Solution:
    # 返回二维列表[[1,2],[4,5]]
    def Print(self, pRoot):
        # write code here
        if not pRoot:
            return []

        ret = []
        tempRet = []
        queue = [pRoot]
        toBePrinted, nextLevel = 1, 0
        while queue:
            tempNode = queue[0]
            queue = queue[1:]
            tempRet.append(tempNode.val)
            toBePrinted -= 1

            if tempNode.left:
                queue.append(tempNode.left)
                nextLevel += 1
            if tempNode.right:
                queue.append(tempNode.right)
                nextLevel += 1

            if toBePrinted == 0:
                ret.append(tempRet)
                tempRet = []
                toBePrinted, nextLevel = nextLevel, 0
        return ret

JianZhiOfferPython/62.html.title: 62. 二叉搜索树的第k个节点
JianZhiOfferPython/62.html.body:
62. 二叉搜索树的第k个节点
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# class TreeNode:
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.left = None
#         self.right = None
class Solution:
    # 返回对应节点TreeNode
    def __init__(self):
        self.k = 0
        self.flag = False # 触底才开始计数
        self.res = None

    def KthNode(self, pRoot, k):
        # write code here
        if not pRoot:
            return None

        self.KthNodeHelper(pRoot, k)
        return self.res

    def KthNodeHelper(self, pRoot, k):
        if not pRoot:
            self.flag = True
            return

        self.KthNodeHelper(pRoot.left, k)

        if self.flag:
            self.k += 1
            if self.k == k:
                self.res = pRoot

        self.KthNodeHelper(pRoot.right, k)

JianZhiOfferPython/64.html.title: 64. 滑动窗口的最大值
JianZhiOfferPython/64.html.body:
64. 滑动窗口的最大值
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
class Solution:
    def maxInWindows(self, num, size):
        # write code here
        '''
         * 题目：滑动窗口的最大值
         * 思路：滑动窗口应当是队列，但为了得到滑动窗口的最大值，队列序可以从两端删除元素，因此使用双端队列。
         *     原则：
         *     对新来的元素k，将其与双端队列中的元素相比较
         *     1）前面比k小的，直接移出队列（因为不再可能成为后面滑动窗口的最大值了!）,
         *     2）前面比k大的X，比较两者下标，判断X是否已不在窗口之内，不在了，直接移出队列
         *     队列的第一个元素是滑动窗口中的最大值'''
        if size == 0 or size > len(num):
            return []
        res = []
        queue = num[:size]
        queue.sort()
        res.append(queue[-1])
        for curStartIndex, newValue in enumerate(num[size:]):
            curStartIndex += 1
            flag = 0
            # 找到合适的插入位置
            for oldValue in queue:
                if oldValue > newValue:
                    break
                else:
                    flag += 1
            queue.insert(flag, newValue)
            # 丢掉前面的
            for _ in range(flag):
                queue.pop(0)
            # 后面的选择丢弃
            flag2 = 1
            while flag2
